sense.def:
Kadar so stvari, na primer živali ali rastline,
classified
, so razdeljene v skupine, tako da so tiste z enakimi značilnostmi v isti skupini.

seg.quote: Twenty-two of these plants are now classified as rare.
The books have been classified according to subject.
The cataloguing and classification of the plants on the island took several months.
The broad outlines of most classifications are quite similar.
